title: Specification problem with the symbol "..."
body:
by **lars.pensjo**: 
The specification of Go uses the symbol in more than one way. Sometimes in examples to
represent a list, and sometimes it is the operator "...". It is clear
(technically) from the surrounding text what is meant, but for beginners (like me) it is
very confusing at some places.

Please excuse me if this is reported elsewhere, I could not search effectively for
"...".
